tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Visiting dentists can be very stressful, but my experience with Dr. Dhruti was absolutely amazing. I experienced minimal waiting time, prompt follow-ups, detailed explanation of my issue and options, and pain free treatment. I would highly recommend her to anyone for dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Made a net search for the nearest clinic which was open on a Sunday. Landed up with some skepticism at this unknown clinic at Dadar Pleasently surprised to come across this young, professional doctor couple who work with care and confidence. Highly recommend .
reply_text:
Thank you for your kind words Mr Manoj, we really appreciate you taking time out to share your experience with us, it only inspires us to work harder and serve better! 
Keep Smiling!
Regards,
Team Smile Again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,Dental Checkup (General),
review:
Namaste,

As they have finished dental treatment today morning, will explain you more later. 

100% satisfied.
Dr Amit, Dr Dhruti & Dr Hitesh # thanks for your kind cooperation. Also thanks to all gals and ladies who genuinely supported while having the dental treatment.

All the best for their future.

Regards
Ankit Patel

Sydney Australia**** *** *** ***

Yes the doctor is very friendly,they explained very well,*** ********* *** **** **********and all the staff treated very politely, they r very supportive.in future I will  introduce to my friends&relatives.the clinic atmosphere also good, easy reachable.they give instructions to take care of good tooth care.

I visited this place first time after getting no from Just dial as I wanted to find out good clinic in my locality , I went without checking background of the clinic and I most satisfied with their positive approach. ********* *** **********, they have latest equipments available with them and Doctores and staff is very polite .

We had an amazing experience. The work done on my tooth was perfect. Could not make out the difference between my original tooth and the one with composite filling with lamination. The doctors were very friendly and gave practical and apt advise. The clinic atmosphere is very professional, clean and well maintained. The staff is also well trained and courteous. After many years I have not been scared of a dentist.

It was a nice experience.. The appointment scheduling thing is good.. I mean u get a confirmation msg even if the appointment has been shifted by 15 odd minutes.. The doctors make sure that u r not uncomfortable during any kind of process.. The staff too Is really helping.. :-) ( smile again)

I have always had the fear of doctors and have always avoided them but surprisingly that wasn't the case here, Doctor Dhruti to the rescue. I have an improved smile thanks to her. And yes! One doctor I'm not scared of anymore. Sincere thanks to Doctor Dhruti and Smile Again.

Extremely professional staff. I face a major phobia of dentists, which in a very professional manner, was taken away by Dr. Amit. Dr. Chavan and his team are extremely efficient with their work, and all their treatments are really cost effective.
Visited doctor for my mother's teeth problems.  Doctor & staff are very professional they explain treatment in detail.
